Education is a fundamental human right

Education is a fundamental human right — Apple: We’re partnering with ConnectED to give technology grants to 114 schools in 29 states. “A lack of equal access to technology and knowledge puts entire communities and populations of students at a disadvantage, especially minorities. […] We want to do our part to change this.” Nice.
